body_content.explanation: An ultra-refined substance has been made extra pure by removing other substances from it:
examples: High-fructose corn syrup is an ultra-refined sweetener found in many processed foods.
I began supplementing my diet by taking capsules of ultra-refined fish oil.

body_content.explanation: of a very high quality, and showing a lot of skill or the result of many improvements:
examples: The bedpost had beautiful carvings accented in ultra-refined goldwork.
Their music is traditional but their playing is ultra-refined, with many delicate embellishments.

body_content.explanation: very polite and showing a lot of knowledge of social rules:
examples: He is known to many as an ultra-refined and sensitive aesthete.
The presenter spoke with ultrarefined eloquence.
